00003 # The Menu class was originally develop by Juan José Conti <jjconti@gnu.org>
00004 # for Life Fighter game. It is intentionally placed in a separeted file so you
00005 # can use it if it's fine for you. If not you can improbe it :-)

00007 # I am sorry. I have no include exausted controls here, so be carefull with the size
00008 # of the images you use.

00010 import os, sys
00011 
00012 import pygame
00013 from pygame.locals import *
00014 
00015 class Menu(object):
00016     '''A generic menu user interface. Allow both keyboard and mouse selection'''
00017 
00018     def __init__(self, screen, background, font1, font2, color1, color2, \
00019                  snd1, snd2, items, index=0):
00020         '''font1 will be used for the selected item and font2 for unselected ones,
00021            sound1 will be used while switching items and sound2 when one is selected '''
00022         self.screenscreen = screen
00023         self.backgroundbackground = background
00024         self.itemsitems = items
00025         #self.n_items = len(items)
00026         self.last_indexlast_index = len(items) - 1
00027         self.indexindex = index
00028         self.donedone = False
00029         self.hor_stephor_step = max(font1.get_height(), font2.get_height())
00030         self.clockclock = pygame.time.Clock()
00031         self.selected_imgsselected_imgs = [font1.render(text, True, color1) for text in items]
00032         self.unselected_imgsunselected_imgs = [font2.render(text, True, color2) for text in items]
00033         self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects = None
00034         self.soundssounds = {}
00035         self.soundssounds["snd1"] = snd1
00036         self.soundssounds["snd2"] = snd2
00037         
00038         #self.screen.blit(self.background, (0,0))
00039 
00040         self._draw_items_draw_items()
00041 
00042         #pygame.mouse.set_pos(self.unselected_rects[index].center)
00043         
00044         #pygame.display.flip()
00045 
00046     def main_loop(self):
00047         '''Returns the index of the selected item'''
00048 
00049         while not self.donedone:
00050 
00051             self.clockclock.tick(10)
00052 
00053             self.screenscreen.blit(self.backgroundbackground, (0,0))    
00054 
00055             for event in pygame.event.get():
00056                 self.controlcontrol(event)
00057 
00058             self._draw_items_draw_items()
00059 
00060             pygame.display.flip()
00061             
00062         self.donedone = False
00063         return self.indexindex
00064 
00065     def control(self, event):
00066         if event.type == QUIT:
00067             sys.exit(0)
00068         if event.type == KEYDOWN:
00069             if event.key in (K_SPACE, K_RETURN, K_KP_ENTER):
00070                 self.selectselect()
00071             elif event.key == K_UP:
00072                 if self.indexindex > 0:
00073                     self.set_indexset_index(self.indexindex - 1)
00074                 else:
00075                     self.indexindex = self.last_indexlast_index
00076             elif event.key == K_DOWN:
00077                 if self.indexindex < self.last_indexlast_index:
00078                     self.set_indexset_index(self.indexindex + 1)
00079                 else:
00080                     self.set_indexset_index(0)
00081         if event.type == MOUSEMOTION:
00082             x,y = pygame.mouse.get_pos()
00083             for i in range(len(self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects)):
00084                 r = self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects[i]
00085                 if r.collidepoint(x,y):
00086                     self.set_indexset_index(i)
00087                     return
00088         if event.type == MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00089             x,y = pygame.mouse.get_pos()
00090             for i in range(len(self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects)):
00091                 r = self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects[i]
00092                 if r.collidepoint(x,y):
00093                     self.selectselect()
00094                     return
00095                 
00096     def set_index(self, index):
00097         if self.indexindex != index:
00098             self.soundssounds["snd1"].play()
00099             self.indexindex = index
00100 
00101     def select(self):
00102         self.soundssounds["snd2"].play()
00103         self.donedone = True
00104 
00105     def _draw_items(self):
00106         rects = []
00107         y = self.hor_stephor_step + 100 # Tune this value as you need
00108         for i in range(len(self.itemsitems)):
00109             if i == self.indexindex:
00110                 img = self.selected_imgsselected_imgs[i]
00111             else:
00112                 img = self.unselected_imgsunselected_imgs[i]
00113             x = (self.screenscreen.get_width() - img.get_width()) / 2
00114             self.screenscreen.blit(img, (x,y))
00115             
00116             if self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects is None:
00117                 rects += [img.get_rect().move(x,y)]
00118 
00119             y += self.hor_stephor_step
00120 
00121         if self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects is None:
00122             self.unselected_rectsunselected_rects = rects
00123 
00124                    
00125 def main():
00126     '''Test the Menu class'''
00127 
00128     #FONTS_DIR = os.path.join("data", "fonts")
00129     #FONT1 = os.path.join(FONTS_DIR,"FreeMonoBold.ttf")
00130     FONT1 = None
00131 
00132     white = (250, 250, 250)
00133     color1 = (200, 0, 0)
00134     color2 = (0, 100, 50)
00135 
00136     pygame.init()
00137     screen = pygame.display.set_mode((800,600))
00138     #background = pygame.image.load(os.path.join("data", "imgs", "bg2.png"))
00139     background = pygame.Surface((800,600))
00140     background.fill(white)
00141     font1 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 60)
00142     font2 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 40)
00143 
00144     items = ["Conway's Tour", "Worlds Editor", "Play", "About"]
00145 
00146     menu = Menu(screen, background, font1, font2, color1, color2, items)
00147 
00148     selection = menu.main_loop()
00149     print selection
00150     
00151 if __name__ == "__main__":
00152     main()
